# scold

Like [praise](https://github.com/funtion/praise), but when you (or your colleagues)
have been bad.

## Installation

```
pip install scold
```

## Usage

```python
from scold import scold

scold()

scold("${Exclamation}! ${EXCLAMATION}!-${EXCLAMATION}! This is just ${adjective}!")
```
